description.value:
When you realize you’ve put your foot in your mouth, you’re adept at quickly backpedaling and playing the fool to save your own skin.

Benefit: Once per day, after you or an ally would fail a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.GcVVfpQ79HdcMqBt]{Bluff}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.1tzIBDaDAO4hmX5C]{Diplomacy}, or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.6fqgiVqlA7u9jS4i]{Intimidate} check outside of combat, you can reroll the check as you try to play off the previous statement as a joke. You must take the result of the reroll, even if it is worse.
